docs.title: Java Full Stack Developer Interview Preparation
docs.text:
pip install mkdocs-mermaid2-plugin

Welcome to my interview preparation notes! This repository contains comprehensive notes on Java Full Stack Development with Angular.

docs.title: 📋 About
docs.text:
flowchart TB
User --> LoadBalancer
LoadBalancer --> App1
LoadBalancer --> App2
App1 --> DB[(Database)]
App2 --> DB

graph LR
A[Browser] --> B[Spring Boot API]
B --> C[(MySQL DB)]

This documentation serves as my personal knowledge base for technical interview preparation, covering core concepts, best practices, and commonly asked questions for Java Full Stack Developer positions.

Tech Stack Focus: Java, Spring Boot, Angular, REST APIs, Databases, and related technologies

docs.title: Angular
docs.text:
• Angular Basics
  • Components & Templates
  • Services & Dependency Injection
  • Routing & Navigation
  • Forms (Template-driven & Reactive)
  • RxJS & Observables
  • State Management (NgRx/Services)
  • HTTP Client & Interceptors
  • Angular Performance Optimization
  • Angular Interview Questions

docs.title: 📅 Study Plan
docs.text:
• Week 1-2: Java & Collections
  • Week 3-4: Spring Framework
  • Week 5-6: Angular & Frontend
  • Week 7-8: Database & JPA
  • Week 9-10: System Design & DSA
  • Week 11-12: Revision & Mock Interviews
